comments.comment_title: My call to Member Services was answered…
comments.comment_content: My call to Member Services was answered immediately. Rebecca fixed my issue promptly and walked me through the process until it was resolved. I appreciate this level of customer service. It is rarer these days and certainly doesn't go unnoticed. Thank you!

comments.comment_title: Jennel Berry was such a huge help…
comments.comment_content: Jennel Berry was such a huge help though out the entire process.  I mentioned during the first meeting that I was nervous, Jennel calmly walked me through the initial process.

comments.comment_title: I joined ECU when I lived in Maine
comments.comment_content: I joined ECU when I lived in Maine. Everyone was so helpful, that I decided to keep my account open when I moved to PA. Here I am almost 10 years later living in a different state and I will never switch to a local bank. Lindsay Nunley helped me finance a fun new toy very quickly.  She is one of the most helpful people that I have worked with.  Reminded me why I bank with you guys. Thanks Lindsay!
comments.company_response_content: Hi Christopher! Thank you for your review. We're so glad you've chosen to stick with us - even in another state! Lindsay and all of us here at Evergreen are happy to help. Please don't hesitate to reach out if we can assist you in the future. Thanks again, and have a great weekend!Evergreen Credit Union

comments.comment_title: I’d give liberty first 5 starts any day…
comments.comment_content: I’d give liberty first 5 starts any day of the week! Everyone was super helpful and they made my first time loan experience fast and easy. I have and will recommend them to anyone I can
comments.company_response_content: Jason we are so happy to hear that you had a great experience.  Thank you for being a member of Liberty First.

comments.comment_title: I  had to identify myself first that is…
comments.comment_content: I  had to identify myself first that is a plus and the communication is the greatest.
comments.company_response_content: We are so glad you had a great experience.

comments.comment_title: Always a great experience each time I…
comments.comment_content: Always a great experience each time I either talk to somebody or go in
comments.company_response_content: Thank you. We appreciate your feedback Sassy B's Delightful Desserts!
